citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Office of Oceanic and Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program
citeinfo.title: Moored Autonomous Hydrophone Array Data from the Gulf of Alaska at 57°N and 151°W (PMEL Vents)

descript.abstract: Hydrophone data can be obtained by time range, original position/time, and 1-day files via ftp. An autonomous hydrophone was deployed and collection of data files began May 2000.
descript.purpose: To monitor the global ocean through underwater acoustics.

cntaddr.address:

2030 S. Marine Science Drive

2030 S. Marine Science Drive
